title: Dunesplitter
author: Zyries
content: A set of gold-tipped arrows with intricate fletching. When the tip is doused in the wielder’s blood, the gold shifts to a green hue. If this is then shot into another being, the being will still feel the pain of it, however will feel invigorated. The effects are described to range variously, from energy in the legs, or quicker thinking. The arrow then seems to embed itself in the target’s armor or skin, seemingly closing the gap between the arrowhead and the material pierced. Wielded by an elderly Satyr, is it intriguing to us researchers how Manarian force seems to accept arrows as a form of spear.
